languages.original_text: Персонаж с мира-кузни получает +{uip|MovementPoints|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +{uip|DodgeBonus|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Forge world characters gain +<u>(AGI bonus / 2)</u> MP and +<u>(2 × AGI bonus)</u>% dodge.

languages.text: Les personnages des mondes forges bénéficient de +{uip|MovementPoints|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +{uip|DodgeBonus|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les personnages des mondes forges bénéficient de +{uip|MovementPoints|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +{uip|DodgeBonus|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}.

Les personnages des mondes forges bénéficient de +{uip|MovementPoints|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +{uip|DodgeBonus|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g}.

languages.text: 铸造世界的角色获得+{uip|MovementPoints|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}加成，以及+{uip|DodgeBonus|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1}%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}加成。

traits.locale_text: 铸造世界的角色获得+<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}加成，以及+<u>（2×敏捷加值）</u>%{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}加成。
铸造世界的角色获得+{uip|MovementPoints|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}加成，以及+{uip|DodgeBonus|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1}%{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}加成。

languages.text: Los personajes de mundos forja ganan +{uip|MovementPoints|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +{uip|DodgeBonus|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los personajes de mundos forja ganan +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +<u>(2 × bonificación por AGI)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g}.

Los personajes de mundos forja ganan +{uip|MovementPoints|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y +{uip|DodgeBonus|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g}.

languages.text: 工業惑星のキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+{uip|MovementPoints|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が+{uip|DodgeBonus|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1}%される。

traits.locale_text: 工業惑星のキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2)</u>、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}が+<u>(2 × AGI ボーナス)</u>%される。
工業惑星のキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+{uip|MovementPoints|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1}、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}が+{uip|DodgeBonus|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1}%される。

languages.text: Персонаж с мира-кузни получает +{uip|MovementPoints|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +{uip|DodgeBonus|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж из мира-кузни получает +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +<u>(2 × бонус ЛВК)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g}.

Персонаж из мира-кузни получает +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +<u>(2 × бонус ЛВК)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g}.

Персонаж из мира-кузни получает +{uip|MovementPoints|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +{uip|DodgeBonus|eda2be0dda7841ce9cce6186ef6e0ce1}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g}.
